meanings.definition: Larvae of wax moths, used as fishing bait.
meanings.sent1: I caught a big fish using waxworms as bait.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen often use waxworms to attract fish.
meanings.sent3: The waxworms decided to go fishing for a change!
meanings.sent4: The waxworms danced on the hook, tempting the fish like a delicious treat.
meanings.sent5: The shiny waxworms wriggled on the hook, luring the fish in.

meanings.definition: Small caterpillars that feed on beeswax.
meanings.sent1: The beekeeper found waxworms in the beehive.
meanings.sent2: Waxworms can cause damage to beehives if not controlled.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous waxworms threw a party in the beehive!
meanings.sent4: The waxworms devoured the beeswax like hungry little monsters.
meanings.sent5: The tiny waxworms nibbled on the beeswax, leaving a trail of destruction behind.
